basic.description: This course is for graduate non-majors and graduate majors needing foundational work in computer science; credit may not be applied towards a graduate degree in computer science. A survey of programming languages and language features and an introduction to compilers. Languages to be discussed include FORTRAN, Pascal, Ada, PL/1, APL, and LISP. An oral presentation is required.
basic.subject: CGS
basic.title: Programming Language Concepts
